expo.name: Bar Peak

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app use the user gallery to access their photos so you can upload their photo to your profile account.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This allow us to use your location to suggest you the best bars and night spots you could entertain yourself. Through this you can get the accurate results.

expo.description: Bar Peak is for you to find places like bars and night clubs near around you . No matter you gonna do party with your girl or boy . You can always have the pleasure of nightclubs, bars, and restaurants just using your location without hassle-free.
